name: Kdam Thmor Pro
description: Kdam Thmor Pro is a revised design of "Kdam Thmor" which is one of Sovichet Tep's typefaces designed and published back in 2013 on Google Fonts. Kdam Thmor Pro is a modern display Khmer typeface based on the writing style of a brush used on a wall. It has an edgy style, a medium size and is suitable for headings and large typography. Gemunu Libre's Latin is used as the Latin counterpart in the project. To contribute, see github.com/sovichet/kdam-thmor-pro
author: Tep Sovichet, Hak Longdey
